datasets.description: Survey responses detailing the roles, techniques, and documentation practices associated with requirements in ML-enabled system projects.
datasets.name: requirements_engineering_for_ML-enabled_systems.csv

queries.question: Which techniques are used in almost equal proportions for eliciting requirements in ML-enabled system projects, with 40.221% (95% CI [39.841, 40.6]), 41.638% (95% CI [41.292, 41.983]), 47.296% (95% CI [46.958, 47.634]), and 35.896% (95% CI [35.535, 36.257]) of respondents indicating so, respectively?
